155.movie_name: Once Upon a Time in America (1984)

17.movie_plot: An alien takes the form of a young widow's husband and asks her to drive him from Wisconsin to Arizona. The government tries to stop them.

116.movie_plot: Christy Brown, born with cerebral palsy, learns to paint and write with his only controllable limb - his left foot.

57.movie_plot: Harry, Ron, and Hermione search for Voldemort's remaining Horcruxes in their effort to destroy the Dark Lord as the final battle rages on at Hogwarts.

109.movie_plot: A doctor discovers that he can communicate with animals.

107.movie_plot: A newspaper reporter enrolls in high school as part of research for a story.
